Package Engine

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Camera
    Game camera with a transform that specifies position, rotation and area viewed by the camera.
    Engine
    Main class
    GameObject
    Class to override to create any game object class.
    GameObjectHandler
    Loops through the objects each tick, executes their code and calls the PhysicsSolver
    Input
    Input class to register mouse and keyboard and make it accessible to all classes through static methods.
    Job
    You can extend this class to create jobs that execute on a new thread.
    PhysicsSolver
    Handles the collision checking and position correction
    ResizerJob
    Handles Window resizing asynchronously
    SaveAndLoadManager
    Class to manage saving and loading and make it accessible to all classes through static methods.
    Scene
    Contains a scene's objects and camera
    SceneManager
    Manages the different scenes you create for the game on the GameStart
    Transform
    Encapsulates the coordinates, rotation and size of an object.
    Viewer
    Handles the drawing loop and graphics in general
